original_text: But when his disciples saw it, they had indignation, saying, To what purpose is this waste?
korean_text: 제자들이 보고 분개하여 이르되 무슨 의도로 이것을 허비하느냐

sentences.original_text: But when his disciples saw it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 제자들이 그것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: To what purpose is this waste?
